Attributes.description: The principles and applications underlying the action and disposition of therapeutic agents (including alternative medicines) in the body. Use of drugs as tools in experimental research.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of BIOL 201, BIOC 202, BIOC 203, BIOC 300.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 9:30, End Time: 11:00, Building: Wesbrook, Room: 100
